name: Coins (Dactyl Dev)
description:
DESCRIPTION:

You find yourself trapped in a nightmare scenario involving a set of mysterious coins and a powerful, demonic entity.  

CONTROLS:

WASD - Move

Left Mouse - Interact

ESC - settings

(Tip: You run faster when you only hold one movement key)

WARNING: There are jumpscares and loud sounds

Subscribe to My Youtube for three hours of terrible luck  

Rate my game!
